title: Dome
description: Tye and a group of teens find themselves trapped in an impenetrable dome that looms over Los Angeles.Inside, they quickly discover that the world has they know it has been altered, along with new superhuman abilities.In their attempts to escape, they are confronted with challenges that'll push them to their mental and physical limits. All the while, trying to unlock the secrets of their alien prison, and save the earth from a terrible fate.
author: Bryan A. Young
